message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1200000 to you. Considering the significant investment we have made into developing this product, I am offering it to you for $1350000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's worth and our business objectives. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing a high-quality asset at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing the details with you further.
